title: Fully Self-Contained Queensland Glamping Seclusion near Granite Belt Wine Country with Gourmet Breakfast & Picnic Hampers
description: Leave the hustle and bustle behind and discover the hidden gems of Queensland's Granite Belt wine region on a luxe glamping retreat at Serenità Stanthorpe. Settle into your own private sanctuary beside the Severn River with a welcome bottle of wine, complimentary picnic hamper, breakfast basket and delightful chocolates. Just eight kilometres from Stanthorpe, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore the vineyards, artisanal farms and homestyle cafes of the gorgeous Granite Belt, along with the jewel in its crown - Girraween National Park. Fully equipped with lavish amenities including an outdoor bathtub and cosy fireplace, your gorgeous glamping tent has everything you need for a tranquil stay in a serene rural landscape.
